name: Galaxy fly-by 1 - clip A
description: Video captured from Lumicles, a real-time particle simulation software I developed in Three.js/WebGL. A fly-by camera controlled by a gamepad allows you to fly through the simulation (more info at www.lumicles.xyz). Find the full version of the video at www.lumicles.xyz/nfts/ Twitter: @fedemarino31 | Instragram: fedemarino31
